hhi_score.label: HHI Score
hhi_score.explanation: The Herfindahl-Hirschman Index measures how concentrated token ownership is. Lower = more decentralized. <1,000 is healthy, >2,500 means whales dominate.
hhi_score.why_matters: High HHI means a few wallets can crash the price. Low HHI means no single entity controls your investment.

top_10_pct.label: Top 10 Holders %
top_10_pct.explanation: What percentage of total supply the 10 largest wallets hold. Lower = more distributed ownership.
top_10_pct.why_matters: If top 10 hold 90%, they can dump and you lose. Distributed ownership protects everyone.

total_holders.label: Total Holders
total_holders.explanation: Count of unique addresses with a non-zero balance. More holders = broader community.
total_holders.why_matters: More holders means more people believe in the project and broader distribution of ownership.

diamond_hands.label: Diamond Hands
diamond_hands.explanation: Wallets that staked and NEVER withdrew - true long-term believers who trust the yield model.
diamond_hands.comparison: VISTA: 65 diamond hands | BONZI: 4 diamond hands
diamond_hands.why_matters: Diamond hands show conviction. These holders believe in sustainable yield over quick flips.

diamond_hands_pct.label: Diamond Hands %
diamond_hands_pct.explanation: Of everyone who ever staked, what percentage never unstaked. Higher = stronger holder conviction.
diamond_hands_pct.why_matters: Shows what portion of your fellow stakers are truly committed vs just testing the waters.

retention_pct.label: Retention Rate
retention_pct.explanation: Of everyone who ever staked, what percentage are currently still staking. Measures ongoing satisfaction.
retention_pct.why_matters: High retention means stakers are happy with their ETH yields and stay. Low retention = something's wrong.

avg_tenure_days.label: Avg Tenure
avg_tenure_days.explanation: How long the average staker has been staking, in days. Longer = more committed community.
avg_tenure_days.why_matters: Long tenure means people aren't just trying it out - they're earning and staying.

max_tenure_days.label: Max Tenure
max_tenure_days.explanation: The longest anyone has been continuously staking. Shows the OGs who believed from day one.
max_tenure_days.why_matters: Proves the protocol has been paying yield consistently for over a year.

total_eth_distributed.label: ETH Distributed
total_eth_distributed.explanation: Actual Ethereum paid out to stakers from trading fees. Not token rewards, not inflation - real ETH you can sell.
total_eth_distributed.why_matters: This is the killer metric. Most memecoins pay holders NOTHING. VISTA/BONZI pay real ETH.

lp_total_eth.label: LP ETH Distributed
lp_total_eth.explanation: ETH distributed to those who provide liquidity (not just stakers). LPs take more risk but earn more.
lp_total_eth.comparison: VISTA LP: 133.65 ETH | BONZI LP: 38.91 ETH
lp_total_eth.why_matters: Shows the full picture - stakers AND liquidity providers both earn real yield.

unique_claimers.label: Unique Recipients
unique_claimers.explanation: How many different wallets have claimed ETH rewards. Unlike Meteora Stake2Earn (top 100 only), everyone earns.
unique_claimers.comparison: VISTA: 448 claimers | BONZI: 21 claimers | Meteora: Top 100 only
unique_claimers.why_matters: Permissionless yield - you don't need to be a whale or rank in top N. Everyone proportionally earns.

avg_claim_eth.label: Avg Claim
avg_claim_eth.explanation: The average amount of ETH received per claim transaction. Varies based on stake size and duration.
avg_claim_eth.why_matters: Shows typical earnings. Small but real and consistent from trading activity.

max_single_claim.label: Max Claim
max_single_claim.explanation: The biggest single claim ever made. Usually from large, long-term stakers.
max_single_claim.why_matters: Proves significant yield is possible for committed stakers.

weekly_trend.label: Weekly Activity
weekly_trend.explanation: How many new stakes vs withdrawals each week. Net positive = growing, net negative = shrinking.
weekly_trend.comparison: VISTA this week: +19 net | BONZI: +1 net
weekly_trend.why_matters: Shows momentum. Consistent positive flow means community is growing, not dying.

net_flow_7d.label: 7-Day Net Flow
net_flow_7d.explanation: New stakes minus withdrawals over the past 7 days. Positive = more joining than leaving.
net_flow_7d.why_matters: Quick health check. Positive = healthy growth. Negative = people leaving.

token_age_months.label: Token Age
token_age_months.explanation: How long the token has existed. Older = more battle-tested and proven.
token_age_months.comparison: VISTA: 16 months | BONZI: 13 months | Murad criteria: >6 months
token_age_months.why_matters: Young tokens often fail. Surviving 12+ months while paying yield proves sustainability.

lp_total_distributions.label: Distribution Count
lp_total_distributions.explanation: Total number of times fees have been distributed to LPs/stakers. More = more consistent.
lp_total_distributions.comparison: VISTA LP: 1,324 distributions | BONZI LP: 597 distributions
lp_total_distributions.why_matters: High count proves consistent, ongoing fee distribution - not a one-time event.

cult_coins.note: No major memecoin pays ETH to holders. VISTA/BONZI are unique.

stake2earn.note: VISTA pays everyone proportionally. Meteora only pays top rankers.

gas.impact: Low gas = more trades = more fees

dex_volume.impact: High DEX activity = favorable for Ethervista fees

memecoin_sector.impact: Memecoin sector strength = tailwind for VISTA/BONZI

btc_dominance.impact: Alt season = more interest in smaller caps like VISTA/BONZI

signals: ✅ Low gas: favorable for trading activity
✅ DEX activity high: good for fee generation
✅ Memecoin sector strong: tailwind for VISTA/BONZI
